IX.iii.1.J.3.c
.
When a Formal Net Worth Administrative Decision Is Required for Claims Received Before October 18, 2018
A formal administrative net worth decision is required for claims received before October 18, 2018, if
the beneficiary has net worth of $80,000 or more, whether or not net worth bars entitlement, or
net worth of any amount bars entitlement.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J - Net Worth, Asset Transfers, and Penalty Periods
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J
